https://docs.kalshi.com/api-reference/ma.info: Dokumentasi endpoint markets dengan parameter lengkap, filter options, response structure, dan 50+ field attributes untuk market data

https://docs.kalshi.com/api-reference/ev.title: Get Events API Reference
https://docs.kalshi.com/api-reference/ev.info: Dokumentasi endpoint events dengan nested markets, milestones, dan struktur data event yang komprehensif

https://docs.kalshi.com/getting_started/.title: Quick Start: WebSockets API Documentation
https://docs.kalshi.com/getting_started/.info: Panduan lengkap WebSocket API untuk real-time data streaming, autentikasi RSA-PSS, dan communication protocols

https://docs.kalshi.com/websockets/webso.title: WebSocket Connection API Documentation
https://docs.kalshi.com/websockets/webso.info: Detail teknis WebSocket connection, subscribe/unsubscribe commands, dan response formats untuk real-time market data

https://docs.kalshi.com/sdks/overview.title: Kalshi SDKs Overview
https://docs.kalshi.com/sdks/overview.info: Overview SDK resmi Kalshi untuk Python dan TypeScript dengan autentikasi RSA-PSS dan full API access

https://docs.kalshi.com/python-sdk.title: Python SDK Documentation

https://docs.kalshi.com/api-reference/ma.title: Get Market Candlesticks API Reference
https://docs.kalshi.com/api-reference/ma.info: Endpoint untuk historical candlestick data dengan OHLCV lengkap, interval 1 menit/1 jam/1 hari, dan parameter start_ts/end_ts

https://news.kalshi.com/p/different-type.title: Different Types of Prediction Markets
https://news.kalshi.com/p/different-type.info: Klasifikasi 6 kategori pasar prediksi: Politik, Ekonomi, Budaya, Ilmu & Teknologi, Lingkungan, dan Perusahaan dengan contoh event types

https://docs.kalshi.com/fix/market-settl.title: Market Settlement Documentation
https://docs.kalshi.com/fix/market-settl.info: Proses settlement market dengan FIX message structure, tag definitions, dan automatic position resolution

https://help.kalshi.com/markets/markets-.title: Market Outcomes Documentation
